mapper.select: select no, title, writer, writeDate, hit from ( select rownum rnum, no, title, writer, writeDate, hit from ( select no, title, writer, writeDate, hit from board order by no desc ) ) where rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
mapper.update: update board set hit = hit + 1 where no = #{no}
mapper.insert: insert into board(no, title, content, writer, pw) values (board_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{pw})
